gurmukhi: ਕਾਲ ਹੀ ਪਾੲਿ ਭਯੋ ਬ੍ਹਮਾ ਸਿਵ ਕਾਲ ਹੀ ਪਾੲਿ ਭਯੋ ਜੁਗੀਅਾ ਹੈ ॥
transliteration: Kaal Hoo Paae Bhayo Brahmaa Siv Kaal Hoo Paae Bhayo Jougooaa Hai||
translation: At the instance of KAL, Brahma appeared and also at the instance of KAL the Yogi Shiva appeared.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਲ ਹੀ ਪਾੲਿ ਸੁਰਾਸੁਰ ਗੰਧ੍ਰਬ ਜੱਛ ਭੁਜੰਗ ਦਿਸਾ ਬਿਦਿਸਾ ਹੈ ॥
transliteration: Kaal Hoo Paae Suraasur Gaddhrab Jachchh Bhujan Disaa Bidisaa Hai||
translation: At the instance of KAL, the gods, demons, Gandharvas, Yakshas, Bhujang, directions and indications have appeared.

gurmukhi: ਅੌਰ ਸੁਕਾਲ ਸਭੈ ਬਸ ਕਾਲ ਕੇ ੲੇਕ ਹੀ ਕਾਲ ਅਕਾਲ ਸਦਾ ਹੈ ॥੮੪॥
transliteration: Aur Soukaal Sabhai Bas Kaal Ke Ek Hoo Kaal Akaal Sadaa Hai||84||
translation: All the other prevalent object are within KAL, only One supreme KAL is ever Timeless and eternal.84.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ ਦੇਵ ਦੇਵੰ ਨਮੋ ਖੜਗਧਾਰੰ ॥ ਸਦਾ ੲੇਕ ਰੂਪੰ ਸਦਾ ਨਿਰਬਿਕਾਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Namo Dev Devan Namo Khadagdhaaran|| Sadaa Ek Roopan Sadaa Nirbikaaran||
translation: Salutation to the God of gods and salutation to the wielder of sword, Who is ever monomorphic and ever without vices.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ ਰਾਜਸੰ ਸਾਤਕੰ ਤਾਮਸੇਅੰ ॥ ਨਮੋ ਨਿਰਬਿਕਾਰੰ ਨਮੋ ਨਿਰਜੁਰੇਅੰ ॥੮੫॥
transliteration: Namo Raajasan Saatakan Taamsean|| Namo Nirbikaaran Namo Nirjurean||85||
translation: Salutation to Him, who manifests the qualities of activity (rajas), rhythm (sattava) and morbidity (tamas). Salutation to Him who is without vices and who is without ailments. 85.
Salutation to Him, who wields the bow in his hands. Salutation to Him, who is Fearless.
Salutation to Him, who is God of gods. Salutation to Him, who shall ever be within the world.86.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ ਖਗ ਖੰਡੰ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਣੰ ਕਟਾਰੰ ॥ ਸਦਾ ੲੇਕ ਰੂਪੰ ਸਦਾ ਨਿਰਬਿਕਾਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Namo Khag Khanndan Kridaanan Kataaran|| Sadaa Ek Roopan Sadaa Nirbikaaran||
translation: Salutation to him, who wields spear, double-edged sword, sword and dagger, Who is ever monomorphic and ever without vices.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ ਬਾਣ ਪਾਣੰ ਨਮੋ ਦੰਡ ਧਾਰਿਯੰ ॥ ਜਿਨੈ ਚੌਦਹੂੰ ਲੋਕ ਜੋਤੰ ਬਿਥਾਰਿਯੰ ॥੮੭॥
transliteration: Namo Baan Paanan Namo Dand Dhaariyan|| Jinai Chaudahoon Lok Jotan Bithaariyan||87||
translation: Salutation to Him, who is the wielder of bow in His hands and who also carries the staff, Who hath spread His Light in all the fourteen worlds.87.

gurmukhi: ਨਮਸਕਾਰਯੰ ਮੋਰ ਤੀਰੰ ਤੁਫੰਗੰ ॥ ਨਮੋ ਖਗ ਅਦੱਗੰ ਅਭੇਯੰ ਅਭੰਗੰ ॥
transliteration: Namaskaarayan Mor Tooran Touphanadg|| Namo Khag Adaggadg Abheyan Abhanadg||
translation: I salute the arrow and the gun, I salute the lustrous sword, which Is impenetratable and indestructible.

gurmukhi: ਗਦਾਯੰ ਗ੍ਰਿਸਟੰ ਨਮੋ ਸੈਹਥੀਯੰ ॥ ਜਿਨੈ ਤੁੱਲੀਯੰ ਬੀਰ ਬੀਯੋ ਨ ਬੀਯੰ ॥੮੮॥
transliteration: Gadaayan Gristan Namo Saihthooyan|| Jinai Tullooyan Boor Booyo Na Booyan||88||
translation: I salute the great mace and lance, which have no equal or second in bravery.88.
